# Colliatur Magic Items
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Colliatur|colliatur]] magic items introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

- [[Greater Crystalline Implant]]
